reviewText: Saw this and had to buy it to see it again and to share with friends and family. "You intended to harm me, but God intended it for good to accomplish what is now being done, the saving of many lives".  Gen. 50:20
This is a must see for any fan of Greg Laurie.  It is an amazing story of how he came to be the man and spiritual leader he is today.

I had no idea who this was.  I randomly saw a youtube clip advertising that a youth group was showing this at their church.  I figured that if a youth group was going to show this then it must be pretty cool.  It is.  Done documentary style, it has some cool old pictures from the Jesus movement in LA.  This is a life of how God grabbed this youth and used him for God's glory.  It is very sweet stuff.
This will change your life. A truly great DVD. Jesus will change your life. Just watch it and The Lord will do the rest. God Bless!
